1.Download selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1-dist.zip file from 
http://archiva.openqa.org/repository/releases/org/openqa/selenium/selenium-remote-control/1.0-beta-1/

2.	Unzip this file. You will get selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1 folder.

3.	Install JDK1.5 or higher. See how to setup java path http://www.ics.uci.edu/~thornton/ics22/LabManual/SettingUpJava.html .

4.	Run selenium remote control server.
 Example for windows :  
         After unzip selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1-dist.zip,  you will get selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1 folder . (see step 3)
         I assume that your selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1 folder located at d:\ selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1.
        
         Start-->Run--->type cmd        
         d:
         cd  d:\selenium-remote-control-1.0-beta-1\selenium-server-1.0-beta-1
         java -jar selenium-server.jar -port 5555

if you see following lines from you console , your selenium romote control server is running now.
